archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Email and Calendar, MS Exchange
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Exchange 2007 - University's Staff email system
We also subscribe to Exchange Online Encryption - Provides email encryption for a small number of staff. Subscription based
We also use Exchange Online Protection - Provides advanced SPAM/Malware/Virus protection for all incoming and outgoing emails. Combined with protection of Exchange servers for multi-layered approach
NOTE: separate email system for students via Office 365?
